Name: Lucky Chant
Effect: Target User and Allies in Range. Unique. Targets can Re-roll one unsuccessful die from all their rolls. Critical Hits do not grant Bonus dice against the Targets. Whole Scene Duration. Out of battle, good things happen at Storyteller's Discretion.
Description: The magical incantation of an old priestess, through dance and song, good fortune and divine protection will come to you. This Move also removes evil spirits and curses.
